name: The Void is Coming
description:
John had visions about what’s coming. The changes in the atmosphere, the catastrophes, the dark starless skies, the emptiness but most frightening, the whispers, the BECKONING.

Disclaimers: 

-This game contains violent scenes which may not be appropriate for kids or sensitive people.

-This game was created as an inspiration for the 5 Stages of Grief model created by 

Swiss American psychiatrist Elisabeth Kübler-Ross.

-This model is meant to take as a reference, not a rule. I encourage people who are interest in this model to research about it and its criticisms.
